title: Bike License Ticket Was Issued
body: Yes, even your bike must be registered and a fee is associated with the registration. To avoid jail time, please register your bike before the end of the week.

example: Example of how to add arbitrary custom attributes to your data for display in the UI
more: You can have multi-valued items as well
note: These custom attributes aren't displayed in the demo UI

title: Past Due Parking Ticket
body: The parking ticket issued two weeks ago has not been paid. To avoid jail time, please pay the fee before the end of the week.

title: Past Due Book
body: Principles of Electromagnetics is past due and must be returned today to avoid a late fee.

title: Past Due Book
body: Introduction to Basket Weaving is past due and must be returned today to avoid a late fee.

title: Book now available
body: You reserved Fundamentals of Marble Stacking, it is now available but you must check it out in the next three days.

title: Advanced Computer Engineering 524
body: After three months of hard work in this class, its time to put all you've learned into your final Hello World project. Please have this ready Tuesday.

title: Basket Weaving 303
body: We are coming to the end of another productive class. Please hand in your completed baskets Monday.

title: English 101
body: You must write a 100 word summary of War and Peace. This is due on Friday.

title: Math 101
body: Chapters 1 - 3 are due tomorrow. There will be a test on these chapters at the end of the week.
